scripts.test:main: npm run main_buildconst && npm run main_buildcommits && npm run main_pil_verify && npm run main_buildstarkinfo && npm run main_buildconsttree && npm run main_prove && npm run main_verify && npm run main_gencircom && npm run main_compileverifier
scripts.main_buildconst: mkdir -p tmp && NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_buildconst.js -o tmp/main.const
scripts.main_buildcommits: mkdir -p tmp &&  NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_buildcommits.js -i src/inputs.json -o tmp/main.commit
scripts.main_pil_verify: mkdir -p tmp &&  NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node node_modules/pilcom/src/main_pilverifier.js tmp/main.commit -p components/main/main.pil -c tmp/main.const -i tmp/publics.json
scripts.main_buildstarkinfo: mkdir -p tmp &&  NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_genstarkinfo.js -p components/main/main.pil -s src/main.starkstruct.json -i tmp/main.starkinfo.json
scripts.main_buildconsttree: mkdir -p tmp &&  NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_buildconsttree.js -c tmp/main.const -p components/main/main.pil -s tmp/main.starkinfo.json -t tmp/main.consttree -v tmp/main.verkey.json
scripts.main_prove: mkdir -p tmp &&  NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_prover.js -m tmp/main.commit -c tmp/main.const -t tmp/main.consttree -p components/main/main.pil -s tmp/main.starkinfo.json -o tmp/main.proof.json -z tmp/main.proof.zkin.json -b tmp/main.public.json
scripts.main_verify: mkdir -p tmp && NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_verifier.js -s tmp/main.starkinfo.json -o tmp/main.proof.json -b tmp/main.public.json -v tmp/main.verkey.json
scripts.main_gencircom: mkdir -p tmp &&  NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_pil2circom.js -p components/main/main.pil -s tmp/main.starkinfo.json -v tmp/main.verkey.json -o tmp/main.verifier.circom
scripts.main_compileverifier: mkdir -p tmp && circom -l node_modules/pil-stark/circuits.gl --O1 --prime goldilocks --r1cs --sym --wasm --verbose tmp/main.verifier.circom -o tmp
scripts.main_proof_verifier: npm run main_proof_verifier:pil && npm run main_proof_verifier:prove
scripts.main_proof_verifier:pil: npm run main_proof_verifier_setup && npm run main_proof_verifier_exec && npm run main_proof_verifier_pil_verify
scripts.main_proof_verifier:prove: npm run main_proof_verifier_buildstarkinfo && npm run main_proof_verifier_buildconsttree && npm run main_proof_verifier_prove && npm run main_proof_verifier_verify
scripts.main_proof_verifier_setup: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node node_modules/pil-stark/src/compressor/main_compressor_setup.js -r tmp/main.verifier.r1cs -p tmp/main.verifier.pil -c tmp/main.verifier.const -e tmp/main.verifier.exec
scripts.main_proof_verifier_exec: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node node_modules/pil-stark/src/compressor/main_compressor_exec.js -i tmp/main.proof.zkin.json -w tmp/main.verifier_js/main.verifier.wasm -p tmp/main.verifier.pil -e tmp/main.verifier.exec -m tmp/main.verifier.commit
scripts.main_proof_verifier_buildconsttree: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_buildconsttree.js -c tmp/main.verifier.const -p tmp/main.verifier.pil -s tmp/main.verifier.starkinfo.json -t tmp/main.verifier.consttree -v tmp/main.verifier.verkey.json
scripts.main_proof_verifier_prove: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_prover.js -m tmp/main.verifier.commit -c tmp/main.verifier.const -t tmp/main.verifier.consttree -p tmp/main.verifier.pil -s tmp/main.verifier.starkinfo.json -o tmp/main.verifier.proof.json -z tmp/main.verifier.proof.zkin.json -b tmp/main.verifier.public.json --proverAddr=0xf39fd6e51aad88f6f4ce6ab8827279cfffb92266
scripts.main_proof_verifier_verify: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_verifier.js -s tmp/main.verifier.starkinfo.json -o tmp/main.verifier.proof.json -b tmp/main.verifier.public.json -v tmp/main.verifier.verkey.json
